about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Discover the passion behind Bella Vista
about.text1: Founded in 1985 by the Rossi family, Bella Vista has been serving authentic Italian cuisine for over three decades. Our commitment to traditional recipes and fresh, high-quality ingredients has made us a beloved destination for food lovers.
about.text2: Every dish is prepared with love and attention to detail, using recipes passed down through generations. From our wood-fired pizzas to our handmade pasta, we bring the authentic taste of Italy to your table.
about.text3: We believe that great food brings people together, and we're honored to be part of your special moments and everyday celebrations.
